contentList.content: Warlocks known as wielders of the Eldritch Edge use martial prowess combined with eldritch power to defeat their foes. These remnants of the Companions who once served Helm seek to regain their glory through infernal means.
Agonizing Blast adds Force damage equal to your Charisma modifier to Eldritch Strike.
Your Eldritch power flows through your melee main hand and offhand attacks adding Force damage equal to your Charisma modifier.
Poison Spray coats your weapons with spider venom dealing 1d4 poison damage for 3 rounds.
Poison Spray coats your weapons with spider venom dealing 2d4 poison damage for 3 rounds.
Warlocks bound to Zanassu often favor dual shortswords as their 'fangs', a fighting style influened by the aranea of Calimshan.
The Poison Spray cantrip also covers the area with relatively weak but sticky spider webs. The primary target is cocooned with cursed webbing making it vulnerable to critical hits.
Cursed webbing is now crawling with hundreds of tiny spiderlings that infest the target, biting and poisoning it and potentially spreading to other targets.
Webs are no longer considered difficult terrain and do not hinder your movement.
Warlocks of Phelegeos practice the use of medium armor, shortswords, rapiers and scimitars.
While surrounded by fire, you warp the flames and smoke to partially obscure yourself. Attackers have disadvantage on attack rolls against you.
The intense power of Hand of Fierna causes a backdraft that potentially sets you on fire.
The Agonizing Blast Invocation now adds Charima modifier Necrotic damage to your melee attacks.
The Repelling Blast Invocation adds a chance for Hand of Fierna to knock enemies prone.
When you use Nether Walk, the flames from which you arrive act like a Symbol of Fear, potentially causing enemies to become frightened.
Striking an enemy affected by Hex with Belial's Agony will heal the Warlock equal to Level + Charisma modifier.
Melee attackers are burned by the flames that surround you.
Melee attackers affected by your aura must make a save or become frightened.
Manifest your spiderlike abilities. Resistance to poison. Spider movement: Immunity to being enwebbed and spider infestation. Grants increased jump distance."
Manifest your spiderlike abilities. Evasion: Mitigate damage from physical attacks. Resistance to poison. Spider movement: Immunity to being enwebbed and increased jump distance."
This cursed webbing applied by Hex also makes the target vulnerable to critical hits."
While surrounded by fire, you warp the flames and smoke to partially obscure yourself. Attackers have disadvantage on attack rolls against you."
An aura eminates from your hand that racks your enemies' bodies with pain and torments them with frightening hallucinations."
Waves of pain and terror emanate from the Hand of Belial"
The pain your enemies experience brings healing"
An aura eminates from your hand that sends waves of intense heat, burning enemies around you."
Waves of intense heat emanate from the Hand of Fierna"
An intense wave of heat burns the target for 1d4 damage"
Manifest your spiderlike abilities. Reistance to poison, immunity to being enwebbed and increased jump distance."
An aura eminates from your hand that racks your enemies' bodies with pain and torments them with frightening hallucinations."
An aura eminates from your hand that sends waves of intense heat, burning enemies around you."

!!CUT!! As a reaction, deal Charisma Modifer + Level to any creature that attacks you in melee combat. If the creature is hexed, you heal for the same amount. On a successful save, the attacker takes no damage."
You pass through Phlegethos and teleport to an unoccupied space brining the fury of hell with you."
!!CUT!! Rend your enemy's flesh and implant spider eggs. Moments later, a swarm of tiny spiders feed on the target and spread webbing around the area"
!!CUT!! Imbue your weapon with Eldritch power to deal force damage. When wielding a finesse weapon, Agonizing Blast channels your Eldritch Blast and Replling Blast can knock enemies prone."
You concentrate your cursed energy into your fist when you strike your enemies."
You channel the power of Fierna and swing your flame blade in an arc of hellfire. The very ground is set ablaze in the wake of your fury."
Your flame blade deals 1d6 damage as Fire. Targets save for half damage. Costs 1 action and 1 bonus action point."
Fire and smoke obscure you, granting increased AC.
Warlocks attuned to the firey 4th layer of the Nine Hells, Phlegethos are fire resistant.
Webs are no longer considered difficult terrain and do not hinder your movement.

Warlocks who draw power from Phlegethos, the 4th layer of the Nine Hells immolate themselves to draw power from the Pit of Flame itself. The pain they experience is a path to power, allowing them to draw strength and lifeforce from others who are burning in the hellish flames.

Warlocks who make a pact with Zanassu, the Spider Demon are granted the powers of his loyal subjects, the Araenas. Spider-like shapeshifters who could throw webs and poison their enemies. These warlocks have also learned Eldritch Strike, which channels their Eldritch Blast through their melee weapon. However, great weapons are too massive for channeling.
